attributes.action: Award Donald Trump the Knight Grand Cross (GBE) - the most prestigious honour.
attributes.background:
Donald Trump must be recognised for his excellent work thus far as the president of the USA.

It would only be fitting to award him with the highest honour to reflect his strength in the face of bleating, vacuous ultra-statist radical teenagers.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
